Name: Goods Tracing
Description:
If you ever find yourself asking "Where are all my metal blocks going?" this mod will help you find out.

The mod adds two new tabs to the settlement panel: good consumption and good production.
Buildings are grouped by good consumed/produced, making it easier to trace where goods are going to and coming from.

- Good consumption: shows all the buildings that are consuming a certain good (e.g. from a recipe).
If a building is under construction, it will also show up consuming the goods it needs to be constructed.
- Good production: shows all the buildings producing a certain good (e.g. from a recipe, farmhouses, etc.).
Buildings such as farmhouses, gatherer flags, etc. show up under the categories for the goods that are actually in range.
